comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110116 Firefox/4.0b10pre
Build Identifier: 

When a new tab modal prompt is displayed on the top of another one only one gradient background should be applied

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the URL
Actual Results:  
4 alerts are displayed at the same time and the background is darker than after displaying only 1 alert

Expected Results:  
Background should look the same as after displaying one alert
